resources.string: The visit summary is where you can go to view information on your past visits with all of your doctors. You will be able to see your diagnoses, vitals, any medications prescribed, follow up instructions and patient instructions. If you believe that there is a mistake in your visit summary please contact your office.

The lab results page is where you can go to view information on your past labs with all of your doctors. You will be able to see your results, normal values, location, notes and which doctor ordered the lab. If you believe that there is a mistake in your lab results please contact your office.

The prescriptions page is where you can go to view information on your current medications. You will be able to see your prescriptions, dosages, instructions, and prescribing doctor. If you believe that there is a mistake in your prescriptions please contact your office.

The chat page is where you are able to go to message your doctor or to video chat with them. It will show you if your doctor is available for live chat or video chat. If your doctor is not available they will respond at their earliest ability.

The appointments page is where you go to request an appointment for your doctors. You will select a day, time, and doctor you would like to see and it will forward a message to the scheduling desk and if those times work they will schedule you and call you to confirm.
The profile page is where you can go to view and update your username, name or email. You will also be able to view your patient ID but will not be able to make any changes.
The patients page is where you can go to view a list of all your patients currently under your care.
The chat page is where you go to respond to patient messages or video chats.
The appointments page is where you go to view your appointments scheduled for a certain day.
The profile page is where you can go to view and update your username, name or email. You will also be able to view your credentials but will not be able to make any changes.
